A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was VERY excited to see The Last Jedi\, largely because The Force Awakens left a gaping whole where Luke Skywalker's story should have been.  Sadly\, The Last Jedi was entertaining but a HUGE disappointment. The list of things WRONG with it is endless\, not the least of which was how they handled -- more accurately\, MISHANDLED -- Skywalker's story.  They've really ruined the franchise for me.
